ficha: Covarrubias, A. & Velez, Verónica (2013). Critical Race Quantitative Intersectionality: An Anti-Racist Research Paradigm that Refuses to ‘Let the Numbers Speak for Themselves’. Lynn, M. & Dixon, A. Handbook of Critical Race Theory in Education. USA: Routledge.
